Sentencas: Two geometries of solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are currently under development, tubular and planar.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both types of cells are configured in a stack using an interconnect, which electrically connects the anode of one cell to the cathode of the adjacent cell, while also physically isolating fuel from oxidant.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Proper design of the interconnect in conjunction with single-cells is critical to minimizing the overall stack resistance.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This work quantitatively examines the dependence of total SOFC stack resistance as a function of interconnect contact spacing, interconnect contact area, cathode thickness, electrolyte thickness, anode thickness, and transport properties associated with each region and at interfaces (charge transfer resistance).
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Both one-dimensional (channels) and two-dimensional (dimples) symmetries of interconnect geometry are analyzed for planar cells.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Analytical expressions are derived for the area-specific resistance (ASR) of a repeat unit consisting of a cell and interconnect, for both geometries, as a function of cell parameters, interconnect contact area and interconnect contact spacing.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is found that the one-dimensional interconnect symmetry leads to lower values of stack-repeat unit area-specific resistance (ASR) than the two-dimensional symmetry.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus, based on the analysis presented here the one-dimensional interconnect geometry is preferred over the twodimensional one.
Titulo: A simple model for interconnect design of planar solid oxide fuel cells
